title: Amazon Kindle Keyword Research | Best Keyword Tool for Kindle Direct Publishing

tactics.name: Incognito Keyword Browsing
tactics.description: Use Amazon's incognito mode to avoid personalized keyword suggestions based on browsing history.
steps: Gather keyword data without historical bias
caveats: Free tools require manual filtering of keyword data
source_quotes: you need to go over into incognito mode

tactics.name: Amazon Keyword Scraping
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to scrape Amazon Marketplace keywords for a root term, analyzing search volume and competition.
steps: Scrape Amazon for keywords using Publisher Rocket
Check Google and Amazon search volumes
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket... scrape the Amazon Marketplace for all relevant keywords... competition score based on a scale of 0 to 100

heuristics.name: Free Tool Limitation
heuristics.condition: If using free keyword tools, expect to manually filter keyword data
source_quotes: free tools come with a bit of a caveat

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, then boost keyword
source_quotes: competitive score below 50... search volume above 100 in search volume per month

claims.statement: Amazon does not provide an official keyword research tool
source_quotes: Amazon is not putting out a keyword research tool

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket continuously updates to support new Amazon platform models
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket team... addressing issues... version 2.0 supports printbook keywords

niche_patterns.description: Target specific niches with low competition by combining identity, problem, and constraint elements
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Narrowly defined niches often have lower keyword competition and higher conversion potential
source_quotes: think of it kind of like panning for gold
